div.p: Use this space to prepare your Collections & Assessment before you share them with students in a class. Please also note that in order to share collections and assessments to students in a class, they have to placed in My Courses.

div.div: Collections are “playlists” of multimedia resources. Copy and remix collections shared by other educators from Search. Or create a collection from scratch, adding your own files and favorite websites.
Create or remix a Gooru assessment using 8 different question types. Link to an external assessment, and students will enter their score.
